summary: In a college, three friends form a secret society. Their objective - going to America. A night, after one of their secret meetings, one of them see a man coming out from a wall. Then the ... See full summary »
cast: Erich von Stroheim|Michel Simon|Armand Bernard|Aimé Clariond|Serge Grave|Marcel Mouloudji|Jean Claudio|Jean Buquet|Robert Rollis|Félix Claude|Claude Roy|René Génin|Jacques Derives|Martial Rèbe|Pierre Labry|Albert Malbert|Robert Le Vigan|Charles Aznavour|André Dionnet|Michel Gaud|Serge Gaud|André Mouloudji|Robert Ozanne|Serge Reggiani|Michel Retaux
title: Les disparus de St. Agil
